overview: Idolized:  Gabbie Carter has been babysitting for Mr. and Mrs. Kingsley for a few months now. Before they leave, they remind Gabbie not to go into Mr. Kingsley's office. Later that night, the batteries in the baby monitor ran out. She can't find the charger ANYWHERE and she has to check at the forbidden office. Her jaw drops in shock when she finds out what's inside.  Happy Household:  Anne is at the cafe with her friend Claudia. While they are discussing, because they have a disagreement on a topic, they make a bet between them. To make things more interesting, whoever loses has to clean the other's house for a week. The next day, Anne is greeted by both Claudia and her husband, Mitch.
title: Idolized
